name: Fishing Simulator (1/10)
description:
Just played a hard game and need to cool off? Try this game. Fish to your hearts content. Sell those fish, and make sure you pay the rent. 

(This game was made for the "Make 10 Short Games! Variety Magajam 2020".)

--Controls--

Right/Left -- Right/Left

Space -- Catch fish

M -- Mute
